roleset.name: to wake or make aware

role.descr: entity arg1 is becoming aware of

example.name: Arg 1 only, most typical usage.
example.text: Many people feel hungry every minute they are awake and fight the fact they know they are literally killing themselves with every bite they take .

example.name: All args
example.text: He was awake to the real things of life!
example.arg: to the real things of life!

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Member of Vncls appear-48.1.1, other_cos-45.4. Framed by Claire.
